title: Segment Tree
description: A segment tree is a binary tree used for storing intervals or segments, allowing efficient range queries and updates.
keyPoints: Supports range queries and updates in O(log n) time.
Used for sum, min, max, gcd, etc. over intervals.

techniques.title: Range Sum Query
techniques.codeSnippet: function query(node, l, r, ql, qr) { if (ql > r || qr < l) return 0; if (ql <= l && r <= qr) return tree[node]; let m = Math.floor((l + r) / 2); return query(2*node, l, m, ql, qr) + query(2*node+1, m+1, r, ql, qr); }
techniques.description: Query the sum in a given range using a segment tree.

codeSnippet.code:
// Segment tree node structure
class SegmentTreeNode { constructor(left, right, sum) { this.left = left; this.right = right; this.sum = sum; this.leftChild = null; this.rightChild = null; } }
